title: Eassos System Restore 2.0.3.589 incl Patch - Crackingpatching
description:
Description: 
Eassos System Restore is powerful and easy-to-use software for system backup, disaster recovery and data protection purposes. It’ll quickly back up your system and easily restore it when anything goes wrong. Both full backup and incremental backup are supported and multiple restore time points are available. The backup file can be password protected, which can avoid undesired system restore.Reliable and easy-to-use system backup & restore software to ensure system security for PCs, laptops, workstations and servers.Easily back up all files of system partition, including system files, installed applications and individual files.Safely restore system to previous backup state when disaster happens, such as system crash and virus infection. 
Step-by-step wizard interface makes system backup and restore quick and easy. 

Fast and Easy to Use 
Installing and using the program is an effortless task. Eassos System Restore comes with a user-friendly and customizable wizard interface which is easy to understand to beginners and allows you to easily perform Windows backup & restore. 
Improved algorithm brings about fast speed for system backup or restore, and different compression types decrease backup file size, saving time and disk space. 

Backup Features 
One-click back up all system files and installed programs of system drive quickly and efficiently. 
Incremental backup is provided, which backs up changed files after the first full backup of system partition, saving disk space and backup time. 
Accordingly, system can be restored to any state that has been backed up before. 

How to Install: 
1). Instructions are included in ReadMe.txt if needed. 
2). Thats all, Done & enjoy
